info.author: James Polera
info.description:
twitch allows you to configure expectations for connections and queues (i.e. counts of each).  If the counts don't match, twitch will notify you via your configured method.

twitch comes with a basic watcher service, but the core API may be integrated into your own monitoring system.
info.name: twitch
info.summary: Keep your expectations monitored on RabbitMQ
info.html_description:
twitch allows you to configure expectations for connections and queues (i.e. counts of each). If the counts don’t match, twitch will notify you via your configured method.

twitch comes with a basic watcher service, but the core API may be integrated into your own monitoring system.
